Larry Page will take charge of the day-to-day operations as Google's CEO and lead product development and technology strategy, w.e.f. April 4th. In this new role he will merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly. I am enormously proud of my last decade as CEO, and I am certain that the next 10 years under Larry Page will be even better! Larry Page , in my clear opinion, is ready to lead, commented Eric Schmidt .
